Title: The Devil's Share
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Amanda Segel, Jonathan Nolan, Sean Hennen (executive story editor), Nic Van Zeebroeck (story), Michael Sopczynski (story)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Sarah Shahi
Plot: The team seeks justice for Carter's murder, but Finch realizes that one person may go too far in the battle against HR. Meanwhile, NYPD officer Patrick Simmons' number comes up.
